ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: An absolute must for a student in political science.

PLSC 761 is a relatively deep dive into the literature on democratization and authoritarianism. It is a small class, which allows each student to participate very heavily in discussion of the material. The class offers an opportunity for the development of a semester-long project. I would recommend it to anybody interested in the subject.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It has informed my research agenda moving forward.
Through this course, I gained a much deeper understanding of an area of the literature that relates closely to my dissertation topic.
